main event: Multiple observations of bright white lights moving at high speeds were reported in Northern California during June 1962.
interesting points: The lights moved in a straight line, stopped momentarily before accelerating out of sight to the east., Witnesses described the phenomenon as occurring in intervals of approximately ten minutes., Objects were observed coming from the same place in the sky and vanishing at the same level., The observation lasted for about 4 minutes., The report was part of Project Blue Book, indicating military interest in UFO sightings.
